Headline: Bus Substitution Between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Shuttle buses replace Blue Line service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Shuttle buses replace rail service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

Trains will run between O’Hare and UIC-Halsted, and between Forest Park and Illinois Medical District.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing construction at the Racine Blue Line station and Morgan substation.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Central
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Central due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Central due to a door problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
